meanings.definition: Tending to escalate or increase in intensity.
meanings.sent1: The argument took an escalatory turn when voices grew louder.
meanings.sent2: The escalatory situation demanded immediate attention.
meanings.sent3: The escalatory tone of the music made everyone dance faster.
meanings.sent4: Her escalatory temper was like a storm brewing on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The escalatory colors of the sunset painted the sky in fiery hues.
